reviewText:
This is 1972 Italian soft core porn. Not much of a story line. People need to relax and to do that, men must be teased by massage until they become out of control. Maurice, a reporter meets Sonia on an airplane and has a night of bliss in Istanbul. He goes to Munich to find her because he likes to get to that point he is ready to explode. One older man exiting the Massage Salon comments, "I'm a bomb."  Plenty of massage and shower scenes.

3 stars for the ample nudity. All the women are topless with a g-string. Some full frontal nudity, male and female. Lots of groping.

Poor quality video transfer.
